title: ‘Trump Tried to Warn Europe, and They Laughed' with Ambassador Ric Grenell and Marjorie Taylor Greene
itunes:title: ‘Trump Tried to Warn Europe, and They Laughed' with Ambassador Ric Grenell and Marjorie Taylor Greene
description:
In this episode, Charlie talks to former acting Director of National Intelligence, Ambassador Ric Grenell who provides an insider's account of Trump's ominous warnings about Germany's "deal with the Devil" on Nord Stream 2, a deal he tried to stop but was laughed at by arrogant Germans. Rick also gives his account of the Biden Regime's intention to destroy the pipeline, including recurring State Department villain, Victoria Nuland's previous public statements on the Nord Stream. Charlie also talks to friend of show, Rep. Marjorie Taylor Green, to ask her some tough questions the listeners want answers to—and she doesn’t disappoint. Why did she choose to support the GOP's "Commitment to America?" They dive into exactly how House Republicans plan to fire Nancy Pelosi, hold the intelligence agencies accountable, and rein in the 87,000 IRS agents Democrats are poised to unleash on Americans.

 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
